cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_PORT_FOR_S1U to an out-of-range value (99999) will cause invalid network interface configuration and S1-U connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid SSB power configuration and synchronization issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的 SSB 功率配置，並造成同步問題。
